Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Djedher, a priest, with a blue painted lappet-wig, a modelled face(damaged) with a beard and crossed arms in relief holding a blue painted adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs(worn); there is a back-pillar(worn) and the remains of a plinth beneath the damaged foot.
Condition: poor - foot damaged, glaze worn from head and back-pillar
